接口 UserInter

  • 所有已知实现类:
    UserImpl

    public interface UserInter
    Title : UserInter.java Description: This interface contains the control interface of controlling the UserInfo.txt and NowUser.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    wenyuan zhang

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addNewUser(User user)
      This method is used to add a new user into UserInfo.txt.
      void deleteUserById(int id)
      This method is used to delete a user in UserInfo.txt by user id.
      java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllUserInfo()
      This method is used to get all user list in UserInfo.txt.
      User getNowUserInfo()
      This method is used to get a user in NowUser.txt by user name.
      void printUserInfo(User user)
      This method is used to print a user details.
      User queryUserInfoById(int id)
      This method is used to get a user in UserInfo.txt by user id.
      User queryUserInfoByName(java.lang.String name)
      This method is used to get a user in UserInfo.txt by user name.
      void updateNowUser(User user)
      This method is used to record the current user in NowUser.txt who is using the system.
      void UpdateUserBudget(int id, float[] budget)
      This method is used to modify the gas usage in UserInfo.txt.

    • 方法详细资料

      • UpdateUserBudget

        void UpdateUserBudget(int id,
                      float[] budget)
        This method is used to modify the gas usage in UserInfo.txt.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        budget - The array includes gas and electricity budget.

      • addNewUser

        void addNewUser(User user)
        This method is used to add a new user into UserInfo.txt.
        参数:
        user - The user need to be stored.

      • deleteUserById

        void deleteUserById(int id)
        This method is used to delete a user in UserInfo.txt by user id.
        参数:
        id - The user id.

      • queryUserInfoById

        User queryUserInfoById(int id)
        This method is used to get a user in UserInfo.txt by user id.
        参数:
        id - The user id.
        返回:
        The return value is a User object.

      • queryUserInfoByName

        User queryUserInfoByName(java.lang.String name)
        This method is used to get a user in UserInfo.txt by user name.
        参数:
        name - The user name.
        返回:
        The return value is a User object.

      • printUserInfo

        void printUserInfo(User user)
        This method is used to print a user details.
        参数:
        user - The user object.

      • getAllUserInfo

        java.util.ArrayList<User> getAllUserInfo()
        This method is used to get all user list in UserInfo.txt.
        返回:
        The return value is a ArrayList include all user.

      • updateNowUser

        void updateNowUser(User user)
        This method is used to record the current user in NowUser.txt who is using the system.
        参数:
        user - The user object.

      • getNowUserInfo

        User getNowUserInfo()
        This method is used to get a user in NowUser.txt by user name.
        返回:
        The return value is a User object.
